page.title: 01Attitudes To Winsford.
page.content: Our class did a survey to find out what Winsford was like in { {1965,1945,1925 and 1905.}Each pupil asked one person various questions about Winsford at these dates. In our survey we found that every person but one agreed that Winsford was better 20,40 and 60 years ago because today we have more unemployment,more vandalism and the people seemed more friendly then. The main changes of Winsford over the passing years have been. The building of the Shopping Centre. The tearing down of the old High Street, the building of the duel carriage way and the new housing estates. Other changes of Winsford are the closing down of cinimars, and dance halls and the death of our Salt Industry. All believed the town would decline further.
